name: Edmund Gray
goal: promote standards for eBusiness, eProcurement and eInvoicing.  Contributing to the developing of standards.  Providing technical assistance to others for these standards. Developing Software to implement these standards and use in new technology
interests: Business and Industry, Customs, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: involvement in European eInvoicing Multi-Stakeholder Forum on eInvoicing (EMSFeI), CEN TC 434, CEN TC440
